titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Sue Frank, also known as Admiral Kishin, is the publisher of several Star Trek-related fan zines, including "Agonizer," "Klin-fire," and "KomereXXX."

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of Star Trek fan newsletters, zines, concordances, and other printed matter assembled by Sue Frank. Many of the materials were created by Klingon fan groups. The collection includes newsletters from many groups in the United States, and also international clubs (Italy, Great Britain, New Zealand, and other locations). The titles include: "Galactic Engineers Concordance Logbook"; "Mindscanners" and "Force Recon," newsletters of the Klingon Assault Group; "Ho1QeD," the journal of the Klingon Language Institute; and "Engage!" The collection also includes a copy of the Trekker Cookbook, a small amount of ephemera from Star Trek conventions, issues of zines on non-Star Trek topics, and correspondence between Frank and members of various fan groups.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
